Posts.Content: kmom80 wrote: I noticed a bruise on my left breast about pencil eraser size back in Sept 2017. I had a MRI and ultrasound in October which were negative. But it never went away. So now it's a little bigger almost dime size and still dark purple. No other breast changes. I'm really starting to worry BC it's getting bigger and not going away and on a vein. I called the breast clinic and they said maybe look into seeing a dermatologist but that insurance wouldn't approve any more imaging right now. Any thoughts? IF it was IBC surely it would have grown a lot more by now. Would appreciate any insight as to what this could be? No lumps. No angry lymph nodes. Occasional stabbing pains. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Six months later and bruise still on breast kmom80 mustlovepoodles

Posts.Content: Feb 23, 2018 01:12PM kmom80 wrote: yes I would still be worried bruises aren't supposed to last for 9+ months
Posts.Title: Six months later and bruise still on breast kmom80 mustlovepoodles
